    • Staff

      public Staff(int ID, String name, String surname, String phoneNumber, String email, String dateOfBirth, ArrayList<String> roles, int holiday, int remainingHoliday)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      ID - Staff ID.
      name - Staff name.
      surname - Staff surname.
      phoneNumber - Staff phone number.
      email - Staff email address.
      dateOfBirth - Staff date of birth.
      roles - Array of all staff's roles.
      holiday - Binary to check whether staff is on holiday.
      remainingHoliday - Counter for remaining staff holiday.
